try: value = json.loads(value_json) if len(value) == 1: value = value["value"] status = value.get("error", None) if not status: status = value.get("status", ErrorCode.UNKNOWN_ERROR) message = value.get("value") or value.get("message") if not isinstance(message, str): value = message message = message.get("message") else: message = value.get("message", None) except ValueError: pass
